metadata.title: CVE-2019-12982 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Ming (aka libming) 0.4.8 has a heap buffer overflow and underflow in thedecompileCAST function in util/decompile.c in libutil.a. Remote attackerscould leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service via acrafted SWF file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
